description.en: The course is made of three sections where each section concentrates on one game engine: Unity, Godot and Unreal Engine 4. The students will practise their knowledge by making a small game prototype in each engine.
description.et: Kursus koosneb kolmest osast, millest iga osa keskendub ühele mängumootorile: Unity, Godot ja Unreal Engine 4. Igat mootorit kasutades teeb tudeng väikese mänguprototüübi rakendades õpitud teadmisi.

objectives.en: The course teaches to use the three common game engines: Unity, Godot and Unreal Engine 4. Students will learn to build their game architectures in each engine and will know which engine is the most fitting for solving a certian problem.
objectives.et: Aines õpetatakse kasutama kolme enamlevinud mängumootorit: Unity, Godot ja Unreal Engine 4. Tudeng õpib neis mootorites looma mängu struktuuri ning teab milline mootor sobib tema probleemi lahendamiseks kõige paremini.

learning_outcomes.en: After taking the course the student:
- Has aquired the fundamental knowledge to use Unity, Godot and Unreal Engine 4 game engines.
learning_outcomes.et: - On omandanud põhiteadmised Unity, Godot ja Unreal Engine 4 mängumootorite kasutamiseks.

learning_outcomes.en: - Is capable of using these engines to program a game.
learning_outcomes.et: - Oskab neid mootoreid kasutades oma mängu programmeerida.

learning_outcomes.en: - Knows the architecure patterns of these engines and is capable of using them.
learning_outcomes.et: - Teab millised on neis mootorites kasutatavad arhitektuurimustrid ning oskab neid kasutada.

learning_outcomes.en: - Is capable of comparing these engines in terms of suitability for solving a specific problem.
learning_outcomes.et: - Oskab võrrelda nende mootorite sobivust oma probleemi lahendamiseks.
